org.overload.algo.pathfinding
Class PNode

java.lang.Object
  org.overload.loc.Node
      org.overload.algo.pathfinding.PNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Locatable, PLocatable
public abstract class PNode
extends Node
implements PLocatable

A node is defined as an x,y pair as it would show up on a computer screen.
Up: y - 1
Down: y + 1
Left: x + 1
Right: x - 1

Author:
Odell

public static boolean isDiagonal(Locatable l1,

Determines whether the two locatable nodes are diagonal each other or not.

true if diagonal, otherwise false.
